Tariff.A2: Unlimited All Local + STD calls, unlimited data usage upto 200Mbps speed
Tariff.A268: Fair Usage Policy apply. Data quota 3333 GB_Speed upto 200Mbps. In case customer exhausts his GB quota during the bill cycle period, the plan speed will get throttled to 1mbps speed and customer will continue to enjoy the services till the end of bill cycle.
Tariff.A269: 1.This Plan is available as per bundled offering under Airtel BLACK Fixed Plan (same as open market plans). 2. Two options are available with this fixedline broadband plan offering to customers. (i) Option 1 (Broadband + Postpaid + DTH Plan) - If customer opts in for Broadband plan of monthly rental Rs. 999 and DTH pack of minimum Rs. 424/month, then he/she will get a monthly discount of Rs. 201 on Broadband Plan (all plan rental are excluded of Taxes) . Also, customer will get a monthly discount of Rs. 220 on postpaid plan of rental Rs. 1097 (ii) Option 2 (Postpaid + Broadband) - If Customer opts Broadband plan of monthly rental Rs. 999, then he/she will get a monthly discount of Rs. 111 on Broadband. (all plan rental are excluded of Taxes). Also, he/ she will get a monthly discount of Rs. 88 on postpaid plan rental of Rs. 798 (iii) Option 3 (Broadband + DTH) - If Customer opts in for Broadband plan of monthly rental Rs. 999 he gets a discount of Rs. 250 on this broadband plan and and DTH pack of minimum Rs. 350/month, (all plan rental are excluded of taxes). 3. The charges are exclusive of applicable taxes. 4. Subscription to Airtel Xstream app . To be subscribed via Airtel Thanks app 5. Subscription to Amazon Prime for 12 months subject to subscriber continuing on the relevant plans. To be subscribed via Airtel Thanks app 6. Unlimited plans are for non-commercial usage
